TopicTitle: Duna Crew Transfert milestone always pops

Articles.Content:
I got the "Duna Crew transfert" milestone. I discarded it.

It keeps poping again and again each time I change ship, if the check test always fails.
Hi Warzouz, please see this thread and provide the affected save file

[quote name='Warzouz']I got the "Duna Crew transfert" milestone. I discarded it.

It keeps poping again and again each time I change ship, if the check test always fails.[/QUOTE]

I need more information to diagnose this issue, and probably the save file. I'm not sure I fully understand the issue. When you say the milestone pops, are you referring to a World First contract that you accepted from Mission Control, or a passive milestone that pops up in the blue notification?

I'm running multiple missions (from a former 1.0.4 save game). Each time I returned to one of the ships from Duna SOI I got the blue sign in the top right coming again. Every time I deleted it but it came back after reloading the scene.

In the evening, this issue seemed to have disappeared. I'll try to reload an older save, a look if I can find it again.

Worst case scenario : I could reload the 1.0.4 save game and redo the crew transfert again (space station is already there).

I'll get in touch when I've done some more testing.
Hmmm, the bug is gone. I can't redo it.
Maybe the save is now fully updated and it's all fixed ?
